When considering the mediatory factors, it is our view that he should be given a non-custodial
sentence. We alter the sentence as follows;

column2: Two years’ rigorous imprisonment for each count suspended for seven years with
A fine of Rs. 5,000/- with a default sentence of 1 month’s simple imprisonment for
In addition to the above, a fine of Rs. 5,000/- with a default sentence of 1 month’s
simple imprisonment under section 26 of the Bribery Act.
